message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe would greatly benefit you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a significant value proposition compared to its worth of $1,200,000 to you, and it allows us to strike a fair deal. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
